### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=6.5, y=-59.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=6.5, y=-59.5)

Consists of following entities

-  Burner mining drill (position x=63.0, y=-54.0)

Consists of following entities

-  Burner inserter at position(x=6.5, y=-61.5)

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple PipeGroups at various positions, including:
-  PipeGroup at position(x=-0.5, y=-4.5) with 39 pipes
-  PipeGroup at position(x=3.5, y=1.5) with 36 pipes
-  Other pipe groups at various positions with a total of 2254 pipes

### Electricity network
Consists of an ElectricityGroup with multiple poles at positions, including:
-  Pole at position(x=-1.5, y=0.5)
-  Pole at position(x=2.5, y=-0.5)
-  Pole at position(x=2.5, y=22.5)
-  Pole at position(x=0.5, y=24.5)
-  Pole at position(x=-7.5, y=24.5)
-  Pole at position(x=-3.5, y=24.5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=63.0, y=-54.0)
-  Assembling machine at position (not specified)
-  Inserter at position (not specified) that puts into assembling machine
-  Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace at position (63.0, -54.0) to assembling machine at position (not specified)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a single lab entity at position(x=0.5, y=0.5) with power connection

### Steam engine at position(x=0.5, y=-0.5)
Consists of a single steam engine entity at position(x=0.5, y=-0.5)

### Offshore pump setup at position(x=-10.5, y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-10.5, y=25.5) connected to steam engine at position(x=0.5, y=-0.5)

### Offshore pump setup at position(x=-5.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-5.5, y=26.5) connected to steam engine at position(x=0.5, y=-0.5)

### Steam engine at position(x=2.5, y=-1.5)
Consists of a single steam engine entity at position(x=2.5, y=-1.5)

### Steam engine at position(x=3.5, y=-1.5)
Consists of a single steam engine entity at position(x=3.5, y=-1.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure you have the required item in your inventory before attempting connection
-  Ensure the entities are compatible and can be connected before attempting connection
-  Ensure the required connection points are not blocked by other entities
-  Ensure the position of the entities is correct

### Errors when crafting pipes
-  Ensure you have enough iron plates to craft the required number of pipes
-  Ensure the recipe requires a crafting machine or smelting in a furnace

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
-  Ensure the furnace is empty or contains the same item being inserted
-  Ensure you have the item to insert in your inventory
-  Ensure the furnace has enough space to insert the items
-  Ensure the furnace is not full

### Errors when extracting items from entities
-  Ensure the entity contains the item being extracted
-  Ensure the entity is in a valid state to extract
-  Ensure the entity is a valid furnace or other extractable entity
-  Ensure the position of the entity is correct

### Errors when checking entity status
-  Ensure
